name: Giant Defense
description:
The most challenging 3D tower defense game, let you challenge the limit without fear of failure!

Humans were almost wiped out by giants who came out of nowhere, and small islands and caves far from the mainland gave humans a chance to breathe. Hundreds of years later, mankind finally invented a new type of turret, and the horn to defend and fight back against giants sounded! Now, use all kinds of weapons to save humanity and discover the secrets of giants!

The brutal battlefield is often referred to as the meat grinder, but this time it is the giant!

Game features

■ 8 types of upgradable towers, each with unique special abilities.
■ 25 challenging levels to conquer!
■ Over 10 powerful enemies to challenge your command abilities.
■ Up to 4 attack routes of giants at the same time, in critical moments, you can only kill the blood road!
■ 3D map, variable viewing angle, let you immerse yourself.
■ Simple operation, automatic archiving.
■ Unlock levels to replay, accumulate wealth and fight again!

This is by far the hardest tower defense game, real-time operation, 3D view, start challenging the global ranking now!
